fields.name: associatedArticle
fields.title: Associated Article
fields.description: A NewsArticle associated with the Media Object.

fields.name: bitrate
fields.title: Bitrate
fields.description: The bitrate of the media object.

fields.name: contentUrl
fields.title: Content Url
fields.description: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file. (previous spelling: contentURL)

fields.name: expires
fields.title: Expires
fields.description: Date the content expires and is no longer useful or available. Useful for videos.

fields.name: requiresSubscription
fields.title: Requires Subscription
fields.description: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription  (either paid or free).

fields.name: uploadDate
fields.title: Upload Date
fields.description: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.
